name: Strange Arcadoid-like
description:
The game works like a normal arkanoid, but the obstacles are constantly being restored. The goal of the game is to reach the top.

The game is only in Russian, so it's worth clarifying:

You can only get one boost of each type. You can select it with the mouse wheel or numbers and use it on the right click. If you get another buff, the past is automatically used with less effect.
Pause on P.
